English:
Fei...
Thank you... for considering me your friend.
Chinese:
菲……
謝謝妳……把我當作朋友。
Korean:
페이…
고마워… 날, 친구라고 생각해 줘서
German:
Fei ...
Danke ... dass ich deine Freundin sein darf.

English:
Of course you're my friend!
We'll always be friends! Always!
Chinese:
那、那是當然的呀！
我一直都在妳身邊！我們永遠都是……朋、朋友呀！
Korean:
그, 그야 당연하잖아요!
계속 곁에 있을게요! 내들은, 계속… 치, 친구예요!
German:
Natürlich sind wir Freundinnen!
Werden wir auch immer sein! Immer!

English:
Oh really? "Friends"? Is that good enough?
Don't you really want more than that?
Chinese:
咦～？朋友～？這樣子就好了嗎～？
其實想要更進一步吧～？
Korean:
어라아~? 친구우~? 그런 걸로 괜찮아~?
사실은 그 이상의 그런 거, 노리고 있는 거 아니야~?
German:
Freundinnen, wie?
Bist du ganz sicher, dass es dabei bleibt?

English:
You dumbass! Watch what y'all are sayin' in fronta
Yuuko, ya frumpy brat!
Chinese:
笨、笨蛋～～～！
妳在悠悠悠悠子大人的面前、說些什麼呀這個醜女～！！
Korean:
바, 바보―――! 
유유유유코 씨 앞에서, 무슨 소릴 하는 거야 이 못난이!!
German:
Blödkopf! Pass auf, was du vor Yuuko sagst, du
hässliche Rotzgöre!

English:
What are you talking about? What were YOU
imagining? Oohoo! So naughty~
Chinese:
說是什麼……妳在想像什麼呀～？
呼呼呼，妳真好色～
Korean:
무슨 소리냐니… 무슨 상상을 하셨나~?
구후후, 야하구만~ 요놈요놈~
German:
Was meinst du denn? Was dachtest du denn, dass
ich meine? Oho, schmutzige Gedanken ...

English:
Oohoo?
Who y'all callin' naughty, ya dirty old thang?!
Chinese:
什麼呼呼呼……
妳是哪來的色老頭呀！？
German:
Oho? Wer hat hier die schmutzigen Gedanken,
du Dreckspatz?!

English:
Whooooooa, no way!
W-W-W-Why?! Why all of a sudden like that?!
Chinese:
騙騙騙騙、騙人的吧！？
為、為為為為、為什麼！？為什麼這麼突然！？
Korean:
거거거거, 거짓말이지!?
어, 어어어어, 어째서!? 왜 그렇게 갑자기――!?
German:
Heee, das gibt es gar nicht!
W-Warum?! Und warum so plötzlich?!
